classSpec.desc: provides additional global attributes for associating specific analyses or interpretations with appropriate portions of a text.

proporciona atributos globales adicionales para asociar análisis específicos o interpretaciones con las partes apropiadas de un texto.

attDef.desc: indicates one or more elements containing interpretations of the element on which the ana attribute appears.
indica uno o più elementi che contengono interpretazioni dell'elemento specificato dall'attributo ana

attDef.valDesc: one or more valid identifiers of one or more interpretive elements (usually fs or interp), separated by white space.

remarks.p: When multiple values are given, they may reflect either multiple divergent interpretations of an ambiguous text, or multiple mutually consistent interpretations of the same passage in different contexts.
